useCase.name: Buy iPhone 2017
useCase.description: As a user, I want to buy an iPhone 2017.
useCase.trigger: Wang asks for the price of an iPhone 2017.

mainSequence.step: Wang asks js for the price of an iPhone 2017.
js provides the price of 10000元 to Wang.
Wang uses Alipay to pay 10000元 to js.
js gives the iPhone to Wang.
